content: keychain dachshund materials 3mm crochet hook 8ply brown acrylic yarn 6mm safety eyes small piece of black felt toy stuffing 1x key ring abbreviations sts stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet increase increase 2sc in same sts decrease invisible decrease/single_crochet 2 stitches together popcorn popcorn with 5 treble_crochet stitches method head 1 magic_ring 6sc _____________________________________________________6 sts 2-3 6sc_______________________________________________________6 sts 4 increase x6____________________________________________________12 sts 5 increase 1sc x6________________________________________________18 sts 6-7 18sc ____________________________________________________18 sts 8 decrease 1sc x6_______________________________________________12 sts start to add stuffing here 9 decrease x6____________________________________________________6 sts fasten_off leave a long end to close hole and to sew to body finish stuffing close hole do not cut off the end yet yarns in progress ears x2 1 magic_ring 6sc ________________________________________________6 sts 2 increase 1sc x3_____________________________________________9 sts 3 9sc ____________________________________________________9 sts 4 decrease 1sc x3____________________________________________6 sts 5 6sc ____________________________________________________6 sts fold in half and without stuffing close with 2sc fasten_off leave a long end to sew to head *i like to use a hair straightener on a low temp to help flatten out the ears body 1 magic_ring 6sc ________________________________________________6 sts 2 increase 1sc x3 ____________________________________________9 sts 3 increase 2sc x3 ___________________________________________12 sts 4 1sc popcorn 2sc popcorn 7sc__________________________12 sts 5-13 12sc_______________________________________________12 sts 14 3sc popcorn 2sc popcorn 4sc making the tail in back loop 1slst ch7 6slst back down the chains you made 1slst in same sts -- start to add stuffing here _________________________12 sts 15 decrease 2sc x2 decrease 1sc in the back loop 1sc_____________9 sts fasten_off leave a long end to close hole finish stuffing close hole weave in the end assemble sew head to body have fun and play around with the direction your dachshund will be facing sew ears between row 6 and 7 around 5 sts apart before cutting the end off after sewing down the second ear go back and pin down the ears to prevent them for lifting glue on safety eyes between row 4 and 5 around 3 sts apart cut out a small triangle for the nose and use glue to apply once glue has dried attach the key ring to the tail of the dachsunh yarns in progress yarns in progress
